Text.Page:
Do not worry about me. Dead or alive, I cannot leave the Citadel of Torment again.

I will do my utmost to help the soldiers that come into this place, but please make sure they know what happened to me.

Warn them of the dangers and tell them I'm here to help,

You found him! Helehr is a true amani warrior.

We will sing his praises and remember his bravery for as long as the high elves would, and we will continue his fight until our last breaths!
